scripts.build:pkg: npm run build && npm run build:pkg:node8-linux-x64
scripts.build:pkg:node8-linux-x64: npx pkg --debug --targets node8-linux-x64 --output bin/blur-monitor package.json && cp -f node_modules/authenticate-pam/build/Release/authenticate_pam.node bin/authenticate_pam.node
scripts.build:tarball: npm run build:binary && cd bin/ && tar -zcvf blur-monitor_linux_amd64.tar.gz blur-monitor authenticate_pam.node
scripts.installer:ubuntu-16.04_amd64: npm run build:binary && cp -f bin/blur-monitor installers/blur-monitor_ubuntu-16.04_amd64/deb/opt/blur-monitor/blur-monitor && cp -f bin/authenticate_pam.node installers/blur-monitor_ubuntu-16.04_amd64/deb/opt/blur-monitor/authenticate_pam.node && cd installers/blur-monitor_ubuntu-16.04_amd64 && dpkg-deb --build deb blur-monitor_ubuntu-16.04_amd64.deb
scripts.installer:ubuntu-18.04_amd64: npm run build:binary && cp -f bin/blur-monitor installers/blur-monitor_ubuntu-18.04_amd64/deb/opt/blur-monitor/blur-monitor && cp -f bin/authenticate_pam.node installers/blur-monitor_ubuntu-18.04_amd64/deb/opt/blur-monitor/authenticate_pam.node && cd installers/blur-monitor_ubuntu-18.04_amd64 && dpkg-deb --build deb blur-monitor_ubuntu-18.04_amd64.deb
scripts.installer:debian-9_amd64: npm run build:binary && cp -f bin/blur-monitor installers/blur-monitor_debian-9_amd64/deb/opt/blur-monitor/blur-monitor && cp -f bin/authenticate_pam.node installers/blur-monitor_debian-9_amd64/deb/opt/blur-monitor/authenticate_pam.node && cd installers/blur-monitor_debian-9_amd64 && dpkg-deb --build deb blur-monitor_debian-9_amd64.deb
